title: Seven Days Watch Face
summary: We use power of Fonts to bring nice, clean and modern look to traditional watch
description: In partnership with world famous Typeface and Graphic designer Igor Mustaev, we are happy to announce our second model of &Watches watch face for Android Wear: Seven Days WatchfaceIn this model we tried to use the power of Fonts to bring nice, clean and modern look to a traditional watch. Date and day of the week rotating wheel will always keep you current.Available only in Black at the moment. We are aiming to bring Gray and White dials in the upcoming updates. Also we think of adding options to choose watch hands in conjunction with a few other complications.Stay tuned for updates! Hope you like it! As we just started with our manufacture we will be more than happy to hear your feedback!
descriptionHTML:
In partnership with world famous Typeface and Graphic designer Igor Mustaev, we are happy to announce our second model of &Watches watch face for Android Wear: Seven Days Watchface

In this model we tried to use the power of Fonts to bring nice, clean and modern look to a traditional watch. Date and day of the week rotating wheel will always keep you current.

Available only in Black at the moment. We are aiming to bring Gray and White dials in the upcoming updates. Also we think of adding options to choose watch hands in conjunction with a few other complications.

Stay tuned for updates! Hope you like it!

As we just started with our manufacture we will be more than happy to hear your feedback!
comments: Basic telling time with day and date. Great.
The best watch in time All ways watch in ready vikash
